Class TTT

  • java.lang.Object
    • TTT

  • public class TTT
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a command base tic Tac toe game to can played by a single user.

      • GameOver

        public static boolean GameOver(int rMove,
                               int cMove)
        Parameters:
        rMove - means the right move
        cMove - means the left move every conditional statements checks if colum 0 is equal to 1 or colum 0 is equal to 2, if all the colums are equals the methods end the game
        Returns:
        true or false considering condition
